empty_tournaments: You have no tournaments right now.
k_description: K - coefficient, the value of which is 10 for players with a rating of 2400 and above, 20 (was 15) - for players with a rating less than 2400 and 40 (was 30) - for new players (the first 30 games since receiving the FIDE rating), as well as for players under 18 years of age whose rating is below 2300.
error_message: Oops!, something went wrong, please check your internet connection.
delete_tournament_message: Are you sure you want to delete this tournament?
